content: I've turned the homotopy category into a preadditive category (was a TODO in mathlib, incoming PR soon). I've also defined a "realization functor" for Breen-Deligne data into any abelian category with endofunctor F. Later, we want to specialize to the endofunctor â„¤[_] of condensed abelian groups.
I pushed more BD stuff. But it's now time for a mathlib bump.
